page.content: and turnips. {EMPLOYMENT Most of the farmers said that they worked by themselves but employed teenagers to do summer jobs.Farmers said that in the future they hope their children will take up their present position on the farms. { {____________________________________ { FARM:Westfield,Foggieton,UpperBeans {____________________________Hill_____ {LAND 85 40 {AMOUNT: acres, acres, N/A {_____________________________________ {LAND Lets grazing grazing. { USE : land & {for ploughing, {grazing, {______________________________________ CONT.
